TopicTitle: Kerbals get stuck on tilted vessel (aircraft; on Kerbin)

Articles.Content:
I just came across this apparent bug, in which a Kerbal becomes unresponsive if he/she climbs upon an airplane that has landed on Kerbin but is slightly tilted (e.g. parked on a slope). The only thing that sort of works to get the Kerbals off the plane is using their RCS thrusters and repeatedly pushing F (climb) until he/she falls of the craft.

A craft that is parked in perfect horizontal condition such as on the KSC runway, is not giving the Kerbals such a headache and walking around on the craft works fine.

Edited April 29, 2015 by Andy81le
